ygData.subject: Re: Kithicor Spookiness
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sheesh.  I *like* Kithicor.  It does have an eerie quality, but I always felt more comfortable in it than most other zones.  It reminds me of the Faydarks
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 13 Jul 1999, Tim and Mary Steed wrote:
>
> I didn't think about it until later, but from the time I
> entered Kithicor to the time I left, I did not SEE one
> single critter. No beetle. No bat. No nothing. He told me
> that he thought the zone was "haunted" in more ways than
> one. At the time, I laughed, thinking that he was taking
> the game a little too seriously.
>
> Now, after hearing other stories from fellow bards, I
> realize he could very well be right.

Sheesh. I *like* Kithicor. It does have an eerie quality,
but I always felt more comfortable in it than most other
zones. It reminds me of the Faydarks back "home."

The zone that scares me to death at night is Nektulos.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
